content.rendered:
The Office of Student Accounts is responsible for billing and collecting tuition and fees, posting payments and disbursements, processing refunds and providing general assistance to students regarding their account with the University. Student Accounts is committed to providing outstanding service to ensure that students understand and may effectively manage their accounts. We hope your time spent working with us — whether via website, telephone, or in person – will result in a positive experience and provide the information you are seeking.

We are constantly looking for ways to better serve you. Student Accounts is committed to providing outstanding service to ensure that students understand and may effectively manage their accounts.

Please take 2-5 minutes to complete our survey regarding your recent experience with us.
